    • Method Detail

      • listInspections

        public java.util.List<Inspection> listInspections(Facility fac)
        List all the inspections at a particular facility. Uses sample dummy data in database.
        Parameters:
        fac - facility to search for inspections
        Returns:
        a list of inspections

      • isInUseDuringInterval

        public boolean isInUseDuringInterval(FacilityUse facUse)
        Checks if a particular room at a facility is in use during an interval. Use 0 for room number if checking the entire facility.
        Parameters:
        facUse - instance of FacilityUse to be checked which indicates the room number and start/end dates
        Returns:
        true if facility/room is in use, otherwise false

      • assignFacilityToUse

        public void assignFacilityToUse(FacilityUse facUse)
        Assigns a facility and room number to use from a particular start date to a particular end date. Enter room number 0 if assigning entire facility to use.
        Parameters:
        facUse - the instance of FacilityUse to be assigned which indicates room number and start/end dates

      • listActualUsage

        public java.util.List<FacilityUse> listActualUsage(Facility fac)
        Lists the usage assignments at a particular facility first by room number and then by date.
        Parameters:
        fac - Facility to list the usage assignments for
        Returns:
        a list of FacilityUse objects containing a room number, start date, and end date.

      • calcUsageRate

        public double calcUsageRate(Facility fac)
        Calculates the current usage rate of a particular facility.
        Parameters:
        fac - Facility to calculate the usage rate of
        Returns:
        number of rooms currently being used divided by the total number of rooms at a facility

      • vacateFacility

        public void vacateFacility(Facility fac,
                           int roomNumber)

      • getFacilityStartDate

        public java.time.LocalDate getFacilityStartDate(Facility fac)
        Gets the creation date of a facility, which is the earliest assigned start date at the facility. Method is used in MaintenanceService to calculate the problem rate for a facility.
        Parameters:
        fac - Facility to get the start date for
        Returns:
        start date of the facility
